title: Second Chance
description: Cruiser Dalton has finally gotten Lex Woods. Now that they’ve made peace with the past, they want to spend every second learning all they can about each other. But when his twin brother, Rey, suddenly returns home from L.A., Cruiser knows something’s wrong and is determined to get to the bottom of it. When he learns Rey might be in serious trouble, he does everything in his power to protect him. That puts a strain on his relationship with Lex. With the stress at home, she needs him to be there for her. Can he be the perfect boyfriend as well as the perfect brother? And when the past catches up with them, Lex wonders if they really can have a future together.
author: Dee J. Stone
